title: Rainy night city driving, almost stopped, pedestrians on sidewalk.
caption: A blue and white car drives slowly on a rainy night in a city street with pedestrians on the sidewalk.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and the visibility is low. The traffic is light, and there are a few cars driving slowly. The pedestrians are walking on the sidewalk, and there are some street lights illuminating the area. The ego vehicle is almost stopped, and there is a red traffic light ahead.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because of the rain and the low visibility. It is approaching a red traffic light, so it needs to stop. There are pedestrians on the sidewalk, so the ego vehicle needs to be cautious and maintain a safe distance from them. The traffic is light, so the ego vehicle can drive at a moderate speed without any sudden braking or lane changes.
